APPOINTMENT_SERVICE_CONFORMATION_POPUP_M: Are you sure you want to delete service
APPOINTMENT_SERVICE_TYPE_CONFORMATION_PO: Are you sure you want to delete service appointment type
CONFIRM_DELETE_AVAILABILITY: There could be appointments booked for this service availability. Are you sure you want to proceed with deleting it?
CONFIRM_EDIT_SERVICE_MESSAGE_KEY: There could be appointments booked against this service. Are you sure you want to save the changes?
NAVIGATION_CONFIRMATION_DIALOG_MESSAGE_K: You may have unsaved changes, please choose an option
SAVE_CONFIRMATION_DIALOG_CONFLICT_KEY: This patient already has an appointment booked at this time. Would you like to proceed or edit the timings?
TIME_SEQUENCE_ERROR_MESSAGE: End time must be after Start time
OVERLAPPING_AVAILABILITY_ERROR_MESSAGE: Seems like there is an overlap in the availability you are trying to add. Please correct it to proceed further
INVALID_SERVICE_FORM_ERROR_MESSAGE: Please correct the values in the fields to proceed
INVALID_TIME_ERROR_MESSAGE: Invalid start/end time. Expected format is hh:mm am/pm.
APPOINTMENT_SERVICE_TYPE_DELETE_CONFIRMA: There are appointments for this type in future, please cancel them before deleting this service appointment type.After deleting the service appt type, you will not be able to see any appts. for it
APPOINTMENT_CREATION_DATE_WARNING: Date chosen is outside the availability of the service
APPOINTMENT_CREATION_START_TIME_WARNING: Start time is outside the service available times
APPOINTMENT_CREATION_END_TIME_WARNING: End time is outside the service available times
APPOINTMENT_CREATION_OUT_OF_RANGE_WARNIN: Selected time slots are outside the service available times
PROVIDERS_NO_APPOINTMENTS_MESSAGE: This week, no appointments are available for any of the Providers
SERVICES_NO_APPOINTMENTS_MESSAGE: This week, no appointments are available for any of the Services
LOCATIONS_NO_APPOINTMENTS_MESSAGE: This week, no appointments are available for any of the Locations
SPECIALITIES_NO_APPOINTMENTS_MESSAGE: This week, no appointments are available for any of the Specialities
APPOINTMENT_STATUS_CHANGE_CONFIRM_MESSAG: Are you sure, you want to mark appointment as {{toStatus}}?
APPOINTMENT_UNDO_CHECKIN_CONFIRM_MESSAGE: Are you sure, you want to undo Check-in?
APPOINTMENT_RESET_CONFIRM_MESSAGE: Are you sure, you want to reset the status to Scheduled?
PRIVILEGE_REQUIRED: User is logged in but doesn't have the relevant privilege
NO_FULFILMENT_MESSAGE: No observations captured for this order.
SELECT_VALUE_FROM_AUTOCOMPLETE_DEFAULT_M: Please select a value from auto complete
NO_OBS_FOUND_MESSAGE: No observations made for this patient.
BROWSER_DOES_NOT_SUPPORT_VIDEO_TAG_MESSA: Your browser does not support the video tag.
APPOINTMENT_STATUS_CANCEL_CONFIRM_MESSAG: This is a recurring appointment. You can cancel either the selected appointment or the entire series
APPOINTMENT_ACCEPT_CONFIRM_MESSAGE: Are you sure, you want to accept the appointment invite?
START_TIME_LESSTHAN_END_TME_ERROR_MESSAG: End time shouldn't be before start time
NO_CONTENT_ERROR_MESSAGE: Selected days do not fall under the end date selected
UNEXPECTED_SERVICE_ERROR: There was an unexpected issue on the server. Please try again
APPOINTMENT_SEARCH_TIME_ERROR: Connection timed out. The request took too long to complete.
APPOINTMENT_CANCEL_CONFIRMATION_TEXT: You will lose appointment details. Do you want to discard these changes?
NO_SERVICE_DATE_CONFLICTS_WARNING_HEADER: You have a no-service date conflict
OVERLAPPING_AND_NO_SERVICE_DATE_CONFLICT: You have an overlapping and no-service date conflict
OVERLAPPING_CONFLICTS_DEFAULT_TEXT: The appointment you are trying to book overlaps with the following dates
RECURRING_OVERLAPPING_CONFLICTS_DEFAULT_: The recurring appointments you are trying to book overlaps with the following dates
APPOINTMENT_CANCEL_CONFIRMATION_TEXT_EDI: You will lose the edited appointment details. Do you want to discard these changes?
APPOINTMENT_SAVE_SUCCESS_HELP_TEXT: Please check Appointment calendar for the updated schedule
APPOINTMENT_UPDATE_CONFIRMATION_TEXT_REC: This will update the details of the entire appointment series. This cannot be reversed!
APPOINTMENT_UPDATE_CONFIRMATION_TEXT_SIN: This will update the details of the selected appointment
APPOINTMENT_SAVE_SUCCESS_TEXT: The new appointment for the patient {patientDetails} has been saved.
PATIENT_DOUBLE_BOOKING_CONFLICT_MESSAGE: Current {currentAppointmentService} request conflicts with {existingAppointmentService} appointment on
NO_SERVICE_CONFLICTS_DEFAULT_TEXT: The {label} service you had selected for the appointment(s) is not available during below listed dates
APPOINTMENT_BOOKING_MESSAGE: Appointment for #patientName, #patientId on #dateTime for #service is booked at #clinicName. For any queries call us on #helpDeskNumber.
RECURRING_APPOINTMENT_BOOKING_MESSAGE: A recurring appointment for #patientName, #patientId for #service is booked for every #frequency at #clinicName. Your next appointment is at #dateTime. For any queries call us on #helpDeskNumber.
TELECONSULTATION_APPOINTMENT_BOOKING_MES: A teleconsultation appointment for #patientName, #patientId on #dateTime for #service is booked at #clinicName. Please click on the link #meetingLink on #dateTime to join the consultation. For any queries call us on #helpDeskNumber.
